theory.brief: Unit 1 học về cộng đồng địa phương với 2 chủ điểm ngữ pháp chính: (1) Từ để hỏi + to-V (question word + to-infinitive) dùng để diễn đạt câu hỏi gián tiếp về việc nên làm gì, và (2) Phrasal verbs (cụm động từ) gồm động từ + giới từ/trạng từ tạo thành nghĩa đặc biệt.
examples: I don't know what to do. (Tôi không biết phải làm gì.)
She asked me where to go. (Cô ấy hỏi tôi nên đi đâu.)
We look after our grandparents. (Chúng tôi chăm sóc ông bà.)
They get on with their neighbors. (Họ hòa thuận với hàng xóm.)

exercises.question: I don't know __________ this traditional craft.
exercises.explanation: Từ để hỏi + to-V: how to + động từ nguyên thể
hints: Cấu trúc: question word + to + V0

exercises.question: She asked me __________ for help.
exercises.explanation: Question word + to-infinitive: who/whom to contact

exercises.question: They haven't decided __________ the community meeting.
Could you tell me __________ this pottery vase?
We are wondering __________ our traditional festival.
hints: how + to + động từ nguyên thể

exercises.question: The artisan showed us __________ the clay pot.
I'm not sure __________ in this traditional costume.
exercises.explanation: Question word + to-V: what to wear

exercises.question: Can you show me __________ to the community center?
exercises.explanation: How + to-infinitive để chỉ cách thức

exercises.question: The children __________ well with each other in the village.
exercises.explanation: Get on with = hòa thuận với ai đó

exercises.question: My grandmother often __________ my younger sister when my parents are busy.
exercises.explanation: Look after = chăm sóc ai đó

exercises.question: We should __________ this tradition for future generations.
exercises.explanation: Hand down = truyền lại (truyền thống, di sản)

exercises.question: The community project was __________ by local volunteers.
exercises.explanation: Set up = thành lập, thiết lập

exercises.question: I'm __________ information about traditional crafts in our area.
The old factory was __________ to build a community park.
She __________ the word 'artisan' in the dictionary.
exercises.explanation: Look up = tra cứu (từ điển, thông tin)

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: I don't know where to find a good artisan
acceptedAnswers: I don't know where to find a good artisan
I don't know where to find a good artisan.
hints: where + to + động từ nguyên thể

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: She asked me how to make pottery
acceptedAnswers: She asked me how to make pottery
She asked me how to make pottery.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: They haven't decided when to visit the craft village
acceptedAnswers: They haven't decided when to visit the craft village
They haven't decided when to visit the craft village.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: Can you tell me what to do next
acceptedAnswers: Can you tell me what to do next
Can you tell me what to do next?
Can you tell me what to do next.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: We get on well with our neighbors
acceptedAnswers: We get on well with our neighbors
We get on well with our neighbors.
hints: get on with = hòa thuận với

exercises.question: Could you show me __________ to weave this basket?
exercises.explanation: How to + động từ = cách làm gì

exercises.question: The elders __________ their knowledge to the younger generation.
exercises.explanation: Pass down = truyền lại (kiến thức, kỹ năng)
hints: Nghĩa 'truyền lại cho thế hệ sau'

exercises.question: We need to __________ ways to preserve our local culture.
exercises.explanation: Find out = tìm ra, khám phá

exercises.question: The community center __________ activities for teenagers every weekend.
exercises.explanation: Put on = tổ chức (sự kiện, hoạt động)

exercises.question: I need to __________ the meaning of 'craftsman' in this context.
exercises.explanation: Work out = tìm hiểu, hiểu ra

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: The artisan showed us how to carve wood
acceptedAnswers: The artisan showed us how to carve wood
The artisan showed us how to carve wood.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: My grandmother looks after the children every day
acceptedAnswers: My grandmother looks after the children every day
My grandmother looks after the children every day.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: They set up a new workshop last month
acceptedAnswers: They set up a new workshop last month
They set up a new workshop last month.

exercises.question: We're trying to __________ the best way to promote our local crafts.
exercises.explanation: Find out = tìm ra (giải pháp, cách thức)

exercises.question: He doesn't know __________ the traditional dance performance.
The community __________ a craft fair every summer.
Can you tell me __________ this pottery?
They need to __________ who will lead the project.
exercises.explanation: Find out = tìm ra, khám phá

exercises.question: She learned __________ traditional baskets from her grandmother.
exercises.explanation: How + to-infinitive sau động từ learn

exercises.question: My parents __________ well with all their neighbors.
exercises.explanation: Get on with = hòa thuận với

exercises.question: I wonder __________ about this issue.
The elders __________ their traditions to young people.
They haven't decided __________ the festival.
We __________ the meaning of that word in the dictionary.
She asked me __________ her with the homework.
The old building was __________ last month.
Do you know __________ this machine?
The volunteers __________ a library for children.
exercises.explanation: Set up = thành lập, thiết lập

exercises.question: I need to __________ which course to choose.
She __________ her younger brother while her parents work.
Could you show me __________ to the museum?
We're trying to __________ information about local history.
exercises.explanation: Find out = tìm ra, khám phá

exercises.question: I'm not sure __________ for the interview.
He didn't __________ at the meeting yesterday.
They explained __________ the traditional craft.
The company __________ the job offer because it was too low.
She understands __________ the problem.
We're __________ a new community center.
Can you tell me __________ contact for more information?
It took him a long time to __________ his illness.
exercises.explanation: Get over = vượt qua (khó khăn, bệnh tật)

exercises.question: They are learning __________ traditional instruments.
The teacher showed us __________ the answer.
Our family __________ this recipe for generations.
I don't know __________ start the project.
They __________ the truth about what happened.
exercises.explanation: Find out = tìm ra, khám phá

exercises.question: I wonder __________ buy fresh vegetables.
The organization was __________ ten years ago.
She knows __________ Vietnamese food.
We __________ our grandparents every weekend.
Do you know __________ this word?
exercises.explanation: Câu hỏi gián tiếp dùng what + S + V

exercises.question: The festival __________ thousands of visitors each year.
exercises.explanation: Put on có thể nghĩa là tổ chức hoặc thu hút

exercises.question: He learned __________ a bike when he was five.
They need to __________ how to solve this problem.
exercises.explanation: Work out = tìm hiểu, giải quyết

exercises.question: I can't decide __________ buy.
She __________ information in the encyclopedia.
We haven't figured out __________ the event.
The craftsmen __________ their skills to apprentices.
exercises.explanation: Pass down = truyền lại (kỹ năng, kiến thức)

exercises.question: Could you explain __________ this device?
They __________ really well despite their differences.
I'm trying to __________ begin my presentation.
The museum __________ an exhibition on local culture.
exercises.explanation: Put on = tổ chức (triển lãm, sự kiện)

exercises.question: She wants to learn __________ pottery.
We need to __________ a solution to this issue.
I don't know __________ ask for advice.
They're __________ their lost dog.
